subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] No evidence is accptable!?
author: Zack Widup
full_text:
Interesting.  Sounds to me like "Sweet Jesus - Kurds In A Fight".  I don't 
hear "Iraq".

Frank R is right - anyone who hears NOTHING out of that has to have 
something wrong.  I just played it while at work and half a dozen people 
came over to see what I was doing. :-)

Most of them heard what I heard.

Zack

On Thu, 25 Oct 2007, Frank Sumption wrote:

>
> I sent him this voice just now. If he can't at least  hear the words, regardless of whether he thinks it paranormal or not, than I think his opinion is meaningless, and he's a fake.
>
> Frank-s
>
